solution_line_template: On Sunday, he delivers an additional {houses_daily_route}-{sunday_customers_no_paper}+{sunday_only_customers}=<<{houses_daily_route}-{sunday_customers_no_paper}+{sunday_only_customers}={papers_sunday}>>{papers_sunday} papers.
He delivers a total of {papers_mon_to_sat}+{papers_sunday}=<<{papers_mon_to_sat}+{papers_sunday}={total_papers_per_week}>>{total_papers_per_week} papers each week.
